title: Smart Nation Era
intro: The Smart Nation era marks Singapore's maturation into one of the world's most digitally connected nations. World-class fibre broadband infrastructure, a nationwide 5G network, and continued government investment have positioned Singapore at the cutting edge of global connectivity.

milestones.event: NGNBN reaches 95% completion ahead of schedule
milestones.detail: The Next Generation Nationwide Broadband Network (NGNBN) achieves 95% completion — two years ahead of its 2015 deadline — bringing high-speed fibre internet to every residential and non-residential premise in Singapore.

milestones.event: Singapore becomes first nation with full 5G standalone coverage
milestones.detail: Singapore becomes the first country in the world to achieve complete nationwide coverage by a 5G standalone network, offering faster mobile speeds and lower latency to all residents and businesses.

milestones.event: S$100 million investment to upgrade network to 10Gbps
milestones.detail: The Singapore government announces an additional S$100 million to upgrade the existing nationwide broadband network to support 10Gbps speeds, future-proofing the nation's digital infrastructure for the next generation.
